name: cerb.ticket.participants.add
script:
inputs:
  record/ticket:
    record_type: ticket
    required@bool: yes

start:
  await:
    form:
      elements:
        sheet/prompt_participants:
          label: Add participants:
          required@bool: yes
          data:
            automation:
              uri: cerb:automation:cerb.data.records
              inputs:
                record_type: address
          limit: 10
          schema:
            layout:
              headings@bool: no
              filtering@bool: yes
              paging@bool: yes
              title_column: _label
            columns:
              selection/id:
              card/_label:
                params:
                  image: yes
                  bold: yes
              card/contact__label:
              card/org__label:

  record.update:
    output: updated_record
    inputs:
      record_type: ticket
      record_id: {{inputs.ticket.id}}
      fields:
        # See: https://cerb.ai/docs/records/types/ticket/
        participant_ids: {{prompt_participants|join(',')}}
    on_success:
      return:
    on_error:
      error:
